start:

available on [GitHub](https://github.com/xMrPente/LimitatiBot)

To change the message text, go to the 'lang' folder in our source code
answer_admin: 👮‍♂️ You are admin, you cannot click this button
start_chat_message:
🆗 Chat Started!

Now, send me **a message** explaining your problem! One of our **Admin** will answer you as soon as possible
message_edited:
**✏️ Modified Message**

You have edited the message, the recipient <u>will not see the modification you made</u>, however we advise you to **rewrite the message correctly**
